data.quote: Anyone who has ever made anything of importance was disciplined.
data.author: Andrew Hendrixson

data.quote: Don’t spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
data.author: Coco Chanel

data.quote: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
data.author: Albert Einstein

data.quote: Optimism is the one quality more associated with success and happiness than any other.
data.author: Brian Tracy

data.quote: Always keep your eyes open. Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.
data.author: Grace Coddington

data.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
data.author: Henry David Thoreau

data.quote: If the plan doesn’t work, change the plan, but never the goal.
data.author: Author Unknown

data.quote: I destroy my enemies when I make them my friends.
data.author: Abraham Lincoln

data.quote: Don’t live the same year 75 times and call it a life.
data.author: Robin Sharma

data.quote: You cannot save people, you can just love them.
data.author: Anaïs Nin

data.quote: It wasn’t raining when Noah built the ark.
data.author: Howard Ruff

data.quote: Take your dreams seriously.
data.author: Author Unknown

data.quote: There is no way to happiness. Happiness is the way.
data.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

data.quote: Holding onto anger is like drinking poison and expecting the other person to die.
data.author: Not

data.quote: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
data.author: Billie Jean King

data.quote: You will succeed because most people are lazy.
data.author: Shahir Zag

data.quote: Genius is 1% inspiration, 99% perspiration.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: A comfort zone is a beautiful place, but nothing ever grows there.
data.author: Author Unknown

data.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Numbing the pain for a while will only make it worse when you finally feel it.
data.author: Albus Dumbledore
